description.db:para: This table is used by the AUTH_JWT module to read the actual JWT secrets which are used for authentication More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;auth_jwt.html.

column.name: id
column.description: Table key, not used by module

column.name: corresponding_tag
column.description: JWT profile tag which this secret belongs to

column.name: secret
column.description: The KEY used for signing the JWT

column.name: start_ts
column.description: UNIX TS for the START period on which the JWT secret is valid

column.name: end_ts
column.description: UNIX TS for the END period on which the JWT secret is valid
